original_text: There is a vanity that takes place on earth, that there are righteous people to whom it happens according to the deeds of the wicked, and there are wicked people to whom it happens according to the deeds of the righteous. I said that this also is vanity.
korean_text: 세상에서 행해지는 헛된 일이 있나니 곧 악인들의 행위에 따라 벌을 받는 의인들도 있고 의인들의 행위에 따라 상을 받는 악인들도 있다는 것이라 내가 이르노니 이것도 헛되도다

sentences.original_text: There is a vanity that takes place on earth
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에서 일어나는 헛된 일이 하나 있다

sentences.original_text: to whom it happens according to the deeds of the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 악인의 행실대로 일어나는 일이 있다

sentences.original_text: to whom it happens according to the deeds of the righteous
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 의인의 행실대로 일어나는 일이 있다

sentences.original_text: I said that this also is vanity
